In England, in the seven days to 06 September, there were 199,338 new confirmed cases (352.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 August, there were 166,646 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (32,692 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 September is 6,178,293 (10,925.3 cases per 100,000 population).
